data.quote: Success isn't easy, and that's a good thing - at least in business. If it was easy, everybody would be doing it and your competition would be outrageous!
data.author: David Fairweather

data.quote: Never let your past decisions determine your future outcome
data.author: Paul Brodie

data.quote: Our character is not defined in the good times, but in the hard times
data.author: Paul Brodie

data.quote: Words can inspire, thoughts can provoke, but only action truly brings you closer to your dreams
data.author: Brad Sugars

data.quote: No one can give you your goals. No one can dig for you. This is your journey
data.author: Warren Philip Gates

data.quote: Quitters never win. Winners never quit!
data.author: Dr. Irene C. Kassorla

data.quote: Some people dream of success, while other people get up every morning and make it happen
data.author: Wayne Huizenga

data.quote: Ambition is the path to success. Persistence is the vehicle you arrive in
data.author: Bill Bradley

data.quote: The truly rich are those who enjoy what they have
data.author: Yiddish proverb

data.quote: A little impatience will spoil great plans.
data.author: Chinese proverb

data.quote: A bird does not sing because it has an answer. It sings because it has a song.
data.author: Chinese proverb

data.quote: Talk does not cook rice.
data.author: Chinese proverb

data.quote: Be not afraid of growing slowly, be afraid only of standing still.
data.author: Chinese proverb

data.quote: A fall into a ditch makes you wiser.
data.author: Chinese proverb

data.quote: Patience is a bitter plant, but its fruit is sweet.
data.author: Chinese proverb

data.quote: Smooth seas do not make skillful sailors.
data.author: African proverb

data.quote: If you don't stand for something, you will fall for something.
data.author: African proverb

data.quote: If your messenger is slow, go to meet him.
data.author: Irish proverb

data.quote: A questioning man is halfway to being wise.
data.author: Irish proverb

data.quote: Perseverance is the mother of good luck.
data.author: Irish proverb
